items.title: Watch December’s New Mystery, Thriller, and True Crime Adaptations!
items.description: Mystery lovers are eating with December's adaptations! There's everything from an ultra creepy Japanese adaptation to a Freida McFadden adaptation.

items.title: A Young Indigenous Sámi Girl in Sweden  Grapples With Her Identity
items.description: A young Sámi girl contends with the grief and angst that comes with losing her grandfather.

items.title: Nestle Up With These December New Historical Fiction Releases
items.description: From 13th-century Bruges to New York in the 1980s—there are generational family sagas, haunting portraits of post-colonial life, and more.

items.title: How I Romanticized My Reading Life (and How You Can Too)
items.description: Have you ever thought of romanticizing your reading life? What would it look like for you?

items.title: Ring Out 2025 With December’s New Comics and Graphic Novels
items.description: Get ready for a cupid who packs heat, a grown, bookish romance, dragons in Paris, a Black superhero in New Orleans, and more.
